overview.description: Akshaya Patra’s mission is to ensure no child in India is deprived of education because of hunger by providing nutritious meals every school day.
overview.vision: No child in India shall be deprived of education because of hunger.
overview.mission: To feed 3 million children every school day by 2025.

partnership_model.description: A public-private partnership model collaborating with governments, corporate donors, philanthropists and volunteers to serve children and communities.

compliance.description: Adheres to laws and regulations to ensure ethical, transparent, and accountable operations.

programs_events.name: Mid-Day Meal Program
programs_events.description: Serves nutritious meals to children in government and government-aided schools across India.
programs_events.impact: Enhances classroom attendance, retention, and health

programs_events.name: Scholarship Program
programs_events.description: Supports education for underprivileged children through scholarships and remedial classes.

programs_events.name: Emergency Relief Feeding
programs_events.description: Provides food assistance during emergencies, including natural disasters and the COVID-19 pandemic.

UTs: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu

impact_metrics.expansion: 6 new kitchens added serving 73,000 additional children
